name: save the earth from asteroids
description:
This simple game was made in 72 hours  for the Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment.

In this game you have to protect the earth from meteorites as much as possible.
This is my first game and my first project. I hope to get advice and criticism from more skilled developers and ordinary users.
The whole project (game) was made by me - Alexander Vasiliev (YATAKTOGOD)
Control
space-start/restart
alt+f4-exit :)
You just have to CLICK on the meteorite to destroy it
